content: HSL-3-R Heavy-duty wedge anchor Ultimate-performance removable heavy-duty wedge anchor with approvals for fire, seismic and cracked concrete (A4 stainless steel, hex head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Combining high tension and shear load resistance along with an easy and reliable installation, HSL-3 are a safe and cost efficient alternative to classical fastening solution such as studs or chemical anchors Excels in cracked concrete from C20/25 to C50/60 Extreme shear load resistance thanks to high strength sleeve Backed by both international ETA and ICC-ESR approvals Collapsing element prevents anchor from spinning in the hole and ensures reliable clamping of the fixture Applications Structural steel Curtain walls ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless steel, A4 Head configuration: Hex head Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless steel, A4 | Head configuration | Hex head | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor, Outdoor ### ITEMS- 2159877 -
